sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Move signing jobs from sys_mass_encryption_job table to sys_signing_job table that are in new state</description>
        <name>Migrate signing jobs</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    if (pm.isZboot())
        return;
    var oldSigningJobTable = 'sys_mass_encryption_job';
    var newSigningJobTable = 'sys_signing_job';
    var gr = new GlideRecord(oldSigningJobTable);
    if (!gr.isValid())
        return;
    gr.addEncodedQuery('sys_class_name=sys_mass_encryption_job^type=mass_sign_records^ORtype=mass_sign_attachments^ORtype=sign_update_set^state=new');
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        gr.autoSysFields(false);
        gr.setWorkflow(false);
        gr.sys_class_name = newSigningJobTable;
        gr.update();
        gs.log(gs.getMessage('Migrated signing job record, name: {0}, sys_id: {1}, state: {2}, type: {3}', [gr.getValue('name'), gr.getUniqueValue(), gr.getValue('state'), gr.getValue('type')]));
    }
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-04-03 20:49:13</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0048f5a8c3422110de5da585b140dd05</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Migrate signing jobs</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Code Signing framework" source="com.glide.code_signing">9cab7c643c35311068bcf327dfe37f23</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_0048f5a8c3422110de5da585b140dd05</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-04-05 19:01:03</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
